name: react-split-pane

scripts.demo: npm run compile && browserify demo/Examples.js -d -t -o demo/bundle.js
scripts.demo:publish: npm run compile && browserify demo/Examples.js -d -t -o demo/bundle.js && surge demo react-split-pane.surge.sh
scripts.demo:watch: npm run compile:watch & watchify demo/Examples.js -d -t -o demo/bundle.js
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run compile && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.test:coverage: mochify --plugin [ mochify-istanbul --exclude '**/test/**' --report lcovonly ] && cat lcov.info | coveralls && rm lcov.info
